# x509Certificate

**Type Property**

A type that represents an X.509 certificate.

## Declaration

```swift
static var x509Certificate: UTType { get }
```

## Discussion

The identifier for this type is `public.x509-certificate`.

This type conforms to [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeData].

## Cryptographic files

- **pkcs12**: A type that represents Public Key Cryptography Standard (PKCS) 12 data.
